website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use 3 layer system that is best for small to medium dogs.
pros: This system includes not only a mat and a tray but a drainage grate that is designed to help direct the urine to the tray and make clean up easier
The unit also comes with a set of clips that help hold the upper mat in place

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is not as advertised and doesn’t have a pull out drawer,that comes out to discard waste . What was delivered is completely reconfigured item and does not resemble, or function as the original pictures depicts.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Moran

customer_reviews.title: works, but needs improvements...
customer_reviews.text: The "grass" just sits lightly on the grid underneath, and is easily often pulled off, making quite a mess. Also the tray underneath which pulls out, has no easy stops or snaps to keep curious pups from pulling it out along with any absorbant pads you might want to use. some sort of velcro tabs to hold the grass on securely, and keep the drawer closed would make it much better. Also if the edge of the artificial grass was stitched or melted so it would not fray so easily, it would keep the masses of green "blades" from turning up all over the house and clogging up the vacuum cleaner and washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: JS1

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper to clean than reusable pads, good porch potty!
customer_reviews.text: I’m buying my second porch potty, the same kind. This is a great product, and no joke even my cat has used it. If you cut a piece of news paper (several layers) in the drawer it keeps the urine from getting all over when you need to dump it. I found it sprays off well with the hose outside and simple green, cleaner. Just be sure to get all the cleaner off. The only reason I have to get another one, my ex threw out my old one. That one went thru over a year with my beloved Teddy Bear “Marley,” (my Westie yorkie he passed away 😭), and over a year with my current yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe ok for an older dog.
customer_reviews.text: Don't think you are going to train a puppy on this thing. Our 12 week old puppy chewed the "grass" mat up the first day.
customer_reviews.author: fay

customer_reviews.title: Just didn’t work like I hoped for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Only one of my dogs will even try the new turf Very irritating. I’m going to try an atractant spray to see if that will help. Putting newspaper or a trimmed pee pad in the drawer makes for a much easier pee clean-up
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Howell

customer_reviews.title: Works well and glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.text: A great addition for training. The grass mat needs to be cleaned often and the bottom of the tray where it catches urine leaks but over all we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Invest in bleach
customer_reviews.text: Easy for daily clean up. But every few days you need to put it in the shower with some bleach. Because it reeks, but comes out smelling clean. The grass is slow to dry though after hosing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Mom B

customer_reviews.title: Deceived
customer_reviews.text: On the pictures of the ad there is a drawer on it. When we got it, there was no drawer on it. Don't deceive people on ads.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kepner
